introduction: For me, programming started as a hobby, playing around with simple things. Soon enough, i have realized, that i was spending more and more time doing just that. It was consuming. I could spent hours doing it, and at this point i understood ... i wanted to persue this furher, seek deeper.
follow_up: Now, after education in full-stack web development, i am emerging as a junior developer, ready to take on new challenges. Even though, i am a junior in web development, i do bring alot experiance in team work, work ethic, communication as well as responsibility, adaptability, loyalty and eagerness to deepen my knowledge. I am excited to see where this journey takes me.
